songs.title: Don’t Forget (Live)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Demi Lovato]
Did you forget
That I was even alive?
Did you forget
Everything we ever had?
Did you forget?
Did you forget
About me?

[Verse 2: Demi Lovato]
Did you regret
Ever standing by my side?
Did you forget
What we were feeling inside?
Now I'm left
To forget
About us

[Chorus: Demi Lovato]
But somewhere we went wrong
We were once so strong
Our love is like a song
You can't forget it

[Verse 3: Demi Lovato]
So now I guess
This is where we have to stand
Did you regret
Ever holding my hand?
Never again
Please don't forget
Don't forget

[Verse 4: Demi Lovato]
We had it all
We were just about to fall
Even more in love
Than we were before
I won't forget
I won't forget
About us

[Chorus: Demi Lovato]
But somewhere we went wrong
We were once so strong
Our love is like a song
You can't forget it

[Breakdown: Demi Lovato]
Somewhere we went wrong
We were once so strong
Our love is like a song
You can't forget it at all

[Bridge: Demi Lovato]
And at last, all the pictures have been burned
And all the past is just a lesson that we've learned
I won't forget, please don't forget
Us

[Outro: Demi Lovato]
Somewhere we went wrong
Our love is like a song
But you won't sing along
You've forgotten about us

[Talking: Demi Lovato]
Haha, thank you so much!
Thank you!
